Package org.waarp.common.filemonitor

This package would like to propose a JSE 6 compatible way to scan a directory for new, deleted and changed files, in order to allow some functions like pooling a directory before actions.

See:
          Description


Interface Summary
FileMonitorCommand Command run when a new file item is validated
 

Class Summary
FileMonitor This package would like to propose a JSE 6 compatible way to scan a directory for new, deleted and changed files, in order to allow some functions like pooling a directory before actions.
FileMonitor.FileItem One element in the directory
FileMonitor.FileMonitorTimerTask Timer task
RegexFileFilter Example of FileFilter using regex on filename
 

Package org.waarp.common.filemonitor Description

This package would like to propose a JSE 6 compatible way to scan a directory for new, deleted and changed files, in order to allow some functions like pooling a directory before actions.

Author:
"Frederic Bregier"
